document_data.name: Hall of the Avenging Hammer
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hall of the Avenging Hammer''' was a temple of [[Tyr]] in [[Telflamm]]. The Hall was led by Lady Justicar [[Vala Destrayal]].<ref name=UE,p184>
